segments.text: Hoo , I'm getting tired , Jeanine , been a long day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not quitting yet . You know my favourite slogan , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I know . Shop till you drop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm getting a little short on cash . Let's just window shop a little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , Jeanine , get a load of that . It's beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ahahah , and I thought you were tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know .. I have a weakness for long dresses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure looks special , looks expensive too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure does . Hey , can I sponge a little cash of you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , Marian , I've got you covered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Jeanine , you are a real pal . Let's go in .
segments.speaker: S1
